TextView.android:text: Any time you have a serious emergency requiring emergency response at work, you should call emergency number. Go to First Aid Basics menu for more information on when to call emergency number. In addition, you should call emergency number if you or your coworkers have any doubts or Concerns, even if you aren' t sure the dispatcher knows how to help.\n\n When calling emergency number from work, you need to remember to dial any prefixes necessary to obtain an outside line before dialing emergency number. In most emergency number calls, a computer in the dispatch center shows the number and address of the phone you' re using, but at a workplace the location of the main switchboard may be the only location appearing on the dispatcher s computer, so it s important that you provide accurate directions.
